description:
To fulfill their promise to Ui, Touka and Nemu set their plan in motion with Embryo Eve.
Yachiyo desperately tries to stop them.
As Alina watches events unfold, Kuroe is isolated and alone. And Kyubey is not far behind…
Meanwhile, Iroha wakes up in her room at home.
Everything looks the same as when Ui was still around.
Finally, Iroha is reunited with Ui.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How Long Do I Have to Keep Being a Magical Girl?
Itsumade Mahou Shoujo o Tsuzukenakya Ikenai no?
いつまで魔法少女を続けなきゃいけないの?
